catalog_info.title: Contemporary Issues in Psychology: Intensive Cross-level Analyses
catalog_info.notes: Hours to be arranged. Mahzarin Banaji and members of the Department Students may take this course before formally declaring Psychology as their concentration. Psy 971 and Psy 975 are interchangeable for Psychology requirements.
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: Science of Living Systems 20 (or equivalent) should be taken before this course. STAT 101 or PSY 1900 should be taken in advance or concurrently.
catalog_info.description: Examines selected issues and phenomena in contemporary psychological research. Special attention to examining topics from a variety of perspectives, to reading primary sources in the field, and to developing thinking, writing, research, and discussion skills. This tutorial, or Psychology 975, is required of concentrators upon entering the concentration, normally in the sophomore year. Letter graded.
